XCoeffs Struct Reference

#include <xcresample.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XCoeffs is a structure contains predefined fixed coefficient values for both (Horizontal and Vertical filters) of two phases (phase 0 and phase 1). This can be used for setting or getting coefficient values from XCresample_SetHCoefs, XCresample_GetHCoefs, XCresample_SetVCoefs and XCresample_GetVCoefs APIs.
